localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Over the past 6 months I've been spending my spare time working on what will likely be my last app for a while. It's called Zones and it's designed to organise all the important parts of your life into separate zones with their tasks, subtasks and ideas.
nodes.title: Zones - An app to organise your life into different tasks
nodes.author: Cristian Moisei

nodes.excerpt: Save those interesting websites, images, videos, tabs and text you find online, then access from anywhere on any device. Share and collaborate with others OR store those sensitive sites in hidden collections that only show with a pin (away from prying eyes)
nodes.title: Siimpl Bookmarking - Simple way to organize your bookmarks on any device
nodes.author: Garry Cummins

nodes.excerpt: Track batteries of your iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch and Mac at the same time on every device. Battery levels are reliable because it uses tracking tech built into your devices.
nodes.title: Batteries - Track battery levels on all devices
nodes.author: Pawan Dixit

nodes.title: Halide for iPad - Pro RAW and manual camera for the professionals

nodes.excerpt: The Streaming Guide for iMessage allows you to quickly share the hottest Movies and TV Shows with friends. All you have to do is search, tap, and send.
nodes.title: The Streaming Guide - Share movies & TV with friends
nodes.author: Gabriel Unruh ğŸ“º

nodes.excerpt: Hop into your new remote office, conveniently located inside your iPad. Connect, create and share with your team from anywhere. Leverage your current iPad tools by sharing any asset or artifact in our interactive docs.
nodes.title: ALLO for iPad - Turn your iPad into a remote office
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Love playing games with friends, but hate fiddling with tiny pencils to keep score? Scorecard is an app that makes it easy to track scores. Add players and start playing! As points are earned, watch as the app updates instantly to show whoâ€™s winning.
nodes.title: Scorecard - Keep score in any game
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: With BIGVU, cut your talking videos in a snap, record with our teleprompter app or import a file. Your video is automatically transcribed. You just need to select the words where you want your video to start and end. Itâ€™s fast and easy. All from your Phone.

nodes.excerpt: Simply point your iPhone or iPad to the Sky and get to know more about every object you can see. Check 120 000 stars, 1200 satellites tracked in real-time, constellations, Messier and Caldwell deep space objects, all Solar system and several meteor showers.
nodes.title: Space Era - AR star guide, night sky in your pocket
nodes.author: Jan PleÅ¡ek

nodes.excerpt: Apple today announced the most powerful and advanced iPad Pro ever, pushing the limits of whatâ€™s possible on iPad. The addition of the Apple-designed M1 chip delivers a massive leap in performance.
nodes.title: The New iPad Pro - Brand new iPad Pro loaded with the M1 chip
nodes.author: Aaron  O'Leary

nodes.excerpt: The biggest update to Live Home 3D since 2016 brings tons of new revolutionary changes. Making a house on a slope or a garden on mountain hills now becomes a reality.
nodes.title: Live Home 3D 4.0 - Design house and landscape of any complexity
nodes.author: Alex Romanchykov

nodes.excerpt: UpNote is an elegant and powerful note-taking app that works across Android, Mac, Windows and iOS. Designed to make it easy to take notes and stay focused, UpNote combines a beautiful interface with a fluid workflow for a refined note-taking experience.
nodes.title: UpNote for Android - Simple, beautiful note-taking app across platforms
nodes.author: Thomas

nodes.excerpt: Path is a simple and free app that will help you put your decisions into context and make them more manageable. Use it to visualise the impact of each option on the parts of your life that are most important.
nodes.title: Path - A free iOS & macOS app for visualising difficult decisions
nodes.author: Cristian Moisei

nodes.excerpt: Vectornator is the best vector graphics software available for the Apple ecosystem. The 4.0 update brings a complete Mac UI Redesign, SF Symbols, Quick Settings, and more! Use Quick Actions to work up to 30% faster!
nodes.title: Vectornator 4.0 - The most Intuitive and Precise Illustration Software.
nodes.author: Vlad Shvets

nodes.excerpt: Blixi is a relaxing puzzle game with beautiful neumorphic design and innovative fresh gameplay. Compete for the top ranks with players from around the world on the constantly updated leaderboards. Blixi is an ideal casual game.
nodes.title: Blixi - Refreshing new colorful puzzle
nodes.author: OlivÃ©r Papp

nodes.excerpt: We think it's likely you have at least a couple of contacts dotted around the globe and we know how difficult it can be keeping track of lots of different time zones. â € Now you can add your contacts and never schedule a call over dinner or bath time again!
nodes.title: Time Zone Pro - A beautiful world clock app for iPhone, iPad, and Mac
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Happy Things is here to help you live a happier life! With hundreds of small, diverse daily activities, the mobile app guides and motivates you to do one thing each day to boost your happiness.
nodes.title: Happy Things - Simple, daily activities to increase your happiness
nodes.author: Talia Soen

nodes.excerpt: A new iOS and iPadOS with personal advice, goal tracking, meditation scenes, daily motivation and more.
nodes.title: Better Year App - Make 2021 a better year: personal advice, goals & meditation
nodes.author: Cristian Moisei

nodes.excerpt: Vinyls is a beautiful music player built with iOS design guidelines in mind. There are no complicated user accounts or settings to configure. You can start listening to your music right away. You can scrub to seek, watch the tone arm follow the playback time.
nodes.title: Vinyls - A beautiful music player for iOS
nodes.author: JPEGuin

nodes.excerpt: Voice Recorder Pro is designed to meet all your recording needs and help you work efficiently, including Audio Recording, Playback, Management, Sharing, Editing, and more. Let everything be in perfect order.
nodes.title: Voice Recorder Pro - The easiest voice recorder and choice of 60 millions users
nodes.author: Andrea Colares

nodes.excerpt: The Unsplash app is home to over 2.5 million free high-resolution images brought to you by the worldâ€™s most generous community of photographers. Find the perfect image, collect your favorite, view your stats and more!
nodes.title: Unsplash for iOS 2.0 - Internetâ€™s source of freely-usable images on your phone
nodes.author: Kirill Zakharov

nodes.excerpt: Mirror iPhone/iPad to your Mac wirelessly. No need to connect iPhone/iPad to Mac with a cable. Demo what's on your iPhone/iPad in online meeting, play games, draw live. PhoneCast is a universal purchase app so you buy once and use it on iPhone, iPad and Mac.
nodes.title: PhoneCast - Mirror iPhone or iPad screen to Mac without wires
nodes.author: Pawan Dixit
